definitions.definition: An enclosure where pigs are kept, either a building or part of one.
examples: The lower pasture also contains a pigsty .

definitions.definition: A dirty or very untidy place.
examples: This room is a pigsty . When are you going to clean it?

main_definition: An enclosure where pigs are kept, either a building or part of one.
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial ) A dirty or very untidy place.
